examples.example: 我们始终致力于提高产品的质量，以满足客户的需求。

translate.english: We are always committed to improving the quality of products to meet the needs of customers.

examples.example: 这家企业一直把产品质量视为生命，努力做到尽善尽美。

translate.english: This enterprise has always regarded the product quality as its life and tries hard to be perfect.

examples.example: 我们一直努力提升服务质量，让每一位顾客都能满意而归。

translate.english: We have been constantly striving to improve the quality of service to make every customer return satisfied.
